trans-unit.source: Represents the configuration section for cache behavior.
trans-unit.target: 表示缓存行为的配置节。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: This class corresponds to the [<requestCaching> Element (Network Settings)](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/requestcaching-element-network-settings.md) configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 此类对应于[ <requestCaching>元素 （网络设置）](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/requestcaching-element-network-settings.md)配置元素。

trans-unit.source: This class is used to access information about default caching behavior for resources requested by using the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> and <xref:System.Net.WebClient> classes.
trans-unit.target: 此类用于访问有关缓存使用请求的资源的行为的默认信息<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>和<xref:System.Net.WebClient>类。

trans-unit.source: This class provides programmatic access to information that can be stored in configuration files.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供以编程方式访问可以在配置文件中存储的信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Configuration.RequestCachingSection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.Configuration.RequestCachingSection" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default FTP caching behavior for the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 获取本地计算机的默认 FTP 缓存行为。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.Configuration.FtpCachePolicyElement" /> that defines the default cache policy.
trans-unit.target: 一个定义默认缓存策略的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Configuration.FtpCachePolicyElement" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default caching behavior for the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 获取本地计算机的默认缓存行为。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.Configuration.HttpCachePolicyElement" /> that defines the default cache policy.
trans-unit.target: 一个定义默认缓存策略的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Configuration.HttpCachePolicyElement" />。

trans-unit.source: Unless the <xref:System.Net.Configuration.RequestCachingSection.DisableAllCaching%2A> property is set to `true`, the policy returned by this property overrides the policy set in the <xref:System.Net.Configuration.RequestCachingSection.DefaultPolicyLevel%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 除非<xref:System.Net.Configuration.RequestCachingSection.DisableAllCaching%2A>属性设置为`true`，此属性返回的策略将覆盖在中设置的策略<xref:System.Net.Configuration.RequestCachingSection.DefaultPolicyLevel%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default cache policy level.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置默认缓存策略级别。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.Cache.RequestCacheLevel" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Net.Cache.RequestCacheLevel" /> 枚举值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that enables caching on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个在本地计算机上启用缓存的布尔值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if caching is disabled on the local computer; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在本地计算机上禁用缓存，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If this configuration attribute is set to `true` in any configuration file, caching is disabled globally, and all other cache related settings are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果此配置属性设置为`true`在任何配置文件中，缓存全局禁用，而且所有其他缓存相关的设置将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: In addition, caching cannot be enabled programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 此外，不能以编程方式启用缓存。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the local computer cache is private.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指示本地计算机缓存是否为私有。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the cache provides user isolation; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果缓存提供用户隔离，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: On client machines, this value is typically set to `true` indicating that one user cannot use resources cached by another user.
trans-unit.target: 在客户端计算机上此值通常设置为`true`，该值指示一个用户无法使用由另一个用户缓存的资源。

trans-unit.source: For middle-tier applications, this value is typically set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 对于中间层应用程序，此值通常设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value used as the maximum age for cached resources that do not have expiration information.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值用作没有过期信息的缓存资源的最大生存期。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> that provides a default maximum age for cached resources.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />，提供缓存资源的默认最大生存期。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property ensures that a resource that does not have expiration header information does not remain fresh in the cache indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: 将设置此属性可确保，没有过期标头信息的资源不会不无限期地保持全新在缓存中。
